name: Deep in Brixen Space
summary: Deep in Brixen Space is an adult platformer game that follows the adventures of Leonora, a furry explorer who crash-lands on a mysterious planet full of tentacles. The game features pixel art graphics, atmospheric music, exploration, puzzles, and sexual encounters with various tentacle creatures. The game is still in development and the current version is an alpha demo that showcases some of the gameplay mechanics and environments.
